import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Calendar=()=>{const weekDays=['Mon','Tues','Wed','Thurs','Fri','Sat','Sun'];const dates=['25','26','27','28','29','30','31'];const timeSlots=[['10:00','08:00','12:00','10:00','','12:00','09:00'],['11:00','09:00','','11:00','14:00','14:00','10:00'],['12:00','10:00','13:00','','16:00','15:00','11:00']];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4 rounded-lg",style:{backgroundColor:'#F6FAFF'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between items-center mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-sm font-semibold text-gray-700",children:"May 2025"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex space-x-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"text-gray-400 hover:text-gray-600",children:"\u2190"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"text-gray-400 hover:text-gray-600",children:"\u2192"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-7 text-center text-xs text-gray-500 mb-1",children:weekDays.map(day=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:day},day))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-7 text-center text-sm mb-2",children:dates.map((date,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"py-1 rounded-lg ".concat(date==='26'?'bg-blue-100 text-blue-800 font-bold':date==='30'?'bg-purple-100 text-purple-700 font-medium':'text-gray-700'),children:date},idx))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"space-y-2 text-xs",children:timeSlots.map((slots,rowIdx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-7 gap-1",children:slots.map((time,colIdx)=>{const isSelected=rowIdx===1&&colIdx===1;// 09:00 blue selected
const isPurpleSlot=time&&(time==='11:00'||time==='12:00'||time==='14:00'||time==='15:00');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center py-0.5 rounded-lg ".concat(isSelected?'bg-blue-600 text-white':isPurpleSlot?'bg-purple-100 text-purple-700':'text-gray-500'),children:time||'—'},colIdx);})},rowIdx))})]});};export default Calendar;
